definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[יִתְּנוּ בַגּוֹיִם]] Ho 8:10 hire (allies) among the nations;

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[הִתְנוּ]] v:Ho 8:9 have hired lovers.—We in both [[יִתְּנוּ]] give: v:Ho 8:9 give  amorous favours, v:Ho 8:10 give (these), cp. Now Marti Harper.—[[תְּנׇה]] Ps 8:2 v. [[נתן]]
